componentInstanceProperties.name: addOnFieldsJson
componentInstanceProperties.value: {"summaryFields":[{"label":"Add On","fieldName":"Catalog_Item_ID__c","dataType":"text","isRequired":false,"isReadOnly":true},{"label":"Activation Code","fieldName":"Catalog_Item_ID__c","dataType":"text","isRequired":false,"isReadOnly":true},{"label":"System Entitlement Id","fieldName":"Entitlement__r.Name","idField":"Entitlement__c","dataType":"recordLink","isRequired":false,"isReadOnly":true},{"label":"License Model","fieldName":"Lead__r.Name","idField":"Lead__c","dataType":"recordLink","isRequired":false,"isReadOnly":true},{"label":"Expiration","fieldName":"Expiration_Date__c","dataType":"date","isRequired":false,"isReadOnly":true},{"label":"Available Units In Line Item","fieldName":"Remaining_Quantity__c","dataType":"number","isRequired":true,"isReadOnly":true},{"label":"Total Units In Line Item","fieldName":"Quantity__c","dataType":"text","isRequired":false,"isReadOnly":true},{"label":"Qty To Add","fieldName":"Quantity__c","dataType":"text","value":"","isRequired":false,"isReadOnly":false,"validation":{"validationFormula":"eachLineSummaryField.Quantity__c < eachLineSummaryField.Remaining_Quantity__c","validationMessage":"Quantity cannot be more than the Available Quantity"}}]}
